bibl.title: Letter from A. Diaz Albertini to Philip Showalter Hench, March 18, 1941

div1.p: Albertini thanks Hench for his letter and interesting items concerning yellow fever. He hopes to meet Hench after his arrival in Havana.

div1.head: Letter from A. Diaz Albertini to Philip Showalter Hench, March 18, 1941
div1.opener:
INSTITUTO FINLAY
-----
HOSPITAL *LAS ANIMAS*
-----
DIRECCION
---
PARTICULAR
---
Havana
March 18- 1941
Dr Philip S Hench.
My dear Dr Hench
div1.p:
I wish to thank you for your kind
letter of March 6th and also for the
interesting items concerning yellow
fever which you send me under separate
cover, as well as the "comic strip: It was
very kind of you to send me all that
material-

It is a pleasure, indeed to hear that you
will come again to Havana and I will be
delighted to arrange for an appointment
as soon as it may be convinient for you after
your arrival in this city
